attributes.additional_details: Suncream for school age children should be allowed to be applied at schools if prescribed due to medical circumstances.Schools should advertise more information on 8 hour sun cream for all children that are able to use it.This prevent heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Not only do this result in enhancing illness they can kill. Also work time is lost to care for those ill and there will be a growing impact on the NHS as the weather gets hotter.Something that takes minutes will save lives,time and valuable NHS time and money.
